An article about this in german:

05.05.2009
Constantin Film verschickt massenhaft Abmahnungen an private Filesharer im Internet und fordert 800 Euro Schadensersatz. Die Telekom und andere ISPs sollen anhand von IP-Adressen die Kundendaten herausgegeben haben.
can you  put Nightmare before christmas

Do not try to play this on your PS3 without remuxing or converting it somehow--it has a cinavia encoded thing that will mute the audio 25 minutes in. remuxing at high won't be as good as mkv but it should be close--film studios are so greedy--name one investment that quintuples like this did in the time it did. 60 million dollar budget, filmed in 4 months and they all ready made 300 million on it. give me a fucking break. 7 dollar sodas, 8 dollar popcorn--doesn't even include merchandise. people like me flogged the fuck out of the game with word of mouth when it first came out, we made you an empire, fuck your big fake titted blond wife, fuck your mistress, drive your fucking ferrari, leave us the fuck alone, stop shark fucking infesting the water for fuck sake--i hate to be a broke dick but MFs need to stop putting a price tag on everything in this MF planet!
Thank You For The Sharing!!! (^_^) Somewhat The Best Movie Seen In 3-D. That's My Honest Opinion.
